channel.title: Lee Bul on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Lee Bul on Artangled

item.title: Lee Bul - Crashing | Hayward Gallery
item.description: What a weird show this is! Following their stellar Gursky retrospective earlier in the year, and some bad juju prior to opening when one of the works caught fire, what remains is a majorly varied grab-bag of paintings, installations, costume, architectural maquettes, a light show and a big-ass zeppelin. It’s less of a sensory assault than a really expensive jumble sale. The show definitely highlights that Lee Bul is epically productive.
